Heart, Settings, Info, Copy, Share, Tick, Save Icons Quotation Marks, Stairs, Plus and Contract Icons Quote of the day is taken from Wikiquote. Popular quates are taken from Reddit Quotes subreddit. All the fonts in this app are taken from Font Squirrel. I do not own any of them.sNavigation drawer header background and Quote of the day backgrounds are taken from Ultimate Material Lollipop Collection by J. Amourette. Quote: Author: Quote Author
